
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52361903">
<font size="5">金庸，华文武侠小说的奠基人，其作品影响深远，塑造了无数经典角色和动人故事。</font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu36.gif" smilieid="1000" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu36.gif" smilieid="1000" border="0" alt=""><br>
<font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">《金庸全集36册》竖版繁体1981年珍藏版，</font>是每位武侠爱好者和文学爱好者不可或缺的经典收藏。</font><img id="aimg_j4d41" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/u_620850314,4106667786_fm_253_fmt_auto_app_138_f_JPEG_6b8966be0dc2e.webp" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/u_620850314,4106667786_fm_253_fmt_auto_app_138_f_JPEG_6b8966be0dc2e.webp"><font size="5"><br>
</font><br>
<img id="aimg_j502K" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/3efce1cc-a1cc-4e0b-ac92-d5156cc3e779_f57a90de5ad6b.jpg" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/3efce1cc-a1cc-4e0b-ac92-d5156cc3e779_f57a90de5ad6b.jpg"><br>
<font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">经典作品：</font></font><br>
<font size="4">全集包含金庸先生的所有武侠小说，</font><br>
<font size="4">包括《射雕英雄传》、《神雕侠侣》、《倚天屠龙记》等，为读者呈现一个丰富多彩的武侠江湖。</font><br>
<font size="4"><br>
</font><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">竖版繁体字：</font></font><br>
<font size="4">采用竖版排版，繁体字印刷，保留了传统的书写风格，适合收藏与阅读。</font><br>
<font size="4"><br>
</font><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">珍藏版：</font></font><br>
<font size="4">1981年出版的珍藏版，具有较高的收藏价值，适合金庸迷和文学爱好者珍藏。</font><br>
<font size="4"><br>
</font><br>
<img id="aimg_fIyz0" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/fdcbeb9f-d78a-43d1-85ef-e92de80dbbdb_3d0878c591b68.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/fdcbeb9f-d78a-43d1-85ef-e92de80dbbdb_3d0878c591b68.png"><font size="4"><br>
</font><br>
<br>
